TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Piling, title = Piling, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piling} }

S.FORM: == Piling == u sulit nu Hulam: 比麟部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Hsinchu a kuwan ku niyazu' nu Piling. u kasalumaluma' nu Piling sa, 94 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 334 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 311 ku tademaw, pakalatu 93%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 23 ku tademaw, pakalatu 7%. u kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 90%, Pangcha(Amis) 1%, zumazuma 2%. caykaw nu Sakizayaay a niyazu', u Tayal a niyazu' kuyni. u Tayal sananay, cayay katalakaw ku uzip, sanglan ku tatayna, salengacay ku banges, mabana miadupay. u Incumin a tademaw tu, u Tayal a cidekay duut ku tademaw. u luma' nu Tayal i buyubuyuan. u Tayan a niyazu' u Tayan a niyazu' kuyni, katuud ku Tayan a tademaw itini. u zuma a tademaw sa u Pangcah, u Yuwatan, u Taluku, inayi' tu ku zuma a cidakay itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ku Sakizaya a tademaw mueneng itini, hakay izaw tu, caay henay misumad ku cidekay a ngangan nu Sakizaya. u cidekay nu Taywan yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 10 a bulad tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bulad pulung sausi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yuwatan (58,465), Rukay (13,319), Puyuma (14,170), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taluku (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laaluwa (401), Kanakanabu (335), zuma (11,985), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taluku (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laaluwa (401), Kanakanabu (335), zuma (11,985)

== Piling == o solit no Holam: 比麟部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Hsincho a kowan ko niyazo' no Piling. o kasalomaloma' no Piling sa, 94 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 334 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 311 ko tademaw, pakalato 93%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 23 ko tademaw, pakalato 7%. o kasabinacadan, Tayan(Tayal) 90%, Pangcha(Amis) 1%, zomazoma 2%. caykaw no Sakizayaay a niyazo', o Tayal a niyazo' koyni. o Tayal sananay, cayay katalakaw ko ozip, sanglan ko tatayna, salengacay ko banges, mabana miadopay. o Incomin a tademaw to, o Tayal a cidekay doot ko tademaw. o loma' no Tayal i boyoboyoan. o Tayan a niyazo' o Tayan a niyazo' koyni, katood ko Tayan a tademaw itini. o zoma a tademaw sa o Pangcah, o Yowatan, o Taloko, inayi' to ko zoma a cidakay itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw inay' ko Sakizaya a tademaw moeneng itini, hakay izaw to, caay henay misomad ko cidekay a ngangan no Sakizaya. o cidekay no Taywan yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 10 a bolad tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 5 a bolad polong saosi (561,916), Pangcah (209,668), Tayan (90,185), Paywan (100,775), Yowatan (58,465), Rokay (13,319), Poyoma (14,170), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taloko (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laalowa (401), Kanakanabo (335), zoma (11,985), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,630), Yami (4,612), Saw (790), Kabalan (1,470), Taloko (31,530), Sakizaya (940), Sejek (10,023), Laalowa (401), Kanakanabo (335), zoma (11,985)
